channel.title: *Wreckless* | Nex with Minions | Chaotics | ECO | Updates Daily! |
channel.description:
[center][shadow=cyan,left][size=18pt]We are Wreckless! And what is Wreckless you may ask? Well it's a crazy friendly community one where you can do some Social Slayer with people and actually have some fun while doing it! We have a ton of stuff to offer you, and let me just tell you...it's just the beginning...[/size][/shadow][/center]
[center][b][size=12pt]So what DO we have to offer you?[/size][/b][/center]
[size=12pt]Well...
-We are dedicated to making this one of the best servers out there, that is why we bought a [shadow=red,left][shadow=red,left]VPS[/shadow][/shadow] which stays on [b]24/7[/b] -One of the things people like most from us...our will to help you guys get the most enjoyment possible and we do this by not asking you to Donate every 5 seconds, because we are not here for the money, we're here for the Experience and Fun. -Daily Updates...and I mean DAILY visit here to see all our [url=http://www.wreckless.smfnew.com/index.php?board=4.0]Updates[/url] -We tons of bosses including: Tormented Demons, Astea Frostweb, Nex as well as his minions, and much more -We like to focus on making it so when you want to skill you can do it in multiple places not just one tree in a skilling area that is why we have guilds, and tons of places to train at, because everyone wants that Completionist Cape -Fully working Chaotic Weapons -Great Economy and by this I mean every single item has its price as perfect as we can get it. That means no 6B whips and no 16B Torva Helms -PK, Activity, Minigame, and many more Shops available at your liking and expenses -Perfect XP Rates -New Torva Armour as well as Pernix and Virtus -Steadfast, Glaiven, and Ragefire boots + more 600-700 items -Elite Slayer Tasks -Completely Rewritten Combat System -Normal and Ancient Prayers -Turmoil also boosting Mage and Range -Rocktails with proper life boosting effect -Perfect Overloads -Minigames written perfectly such as Pest Control, Dominion Tower, Barrows, Gravedigger and more -Double Experience Weekends -Highscores -Fully Functional Clan Chat with lootshare which announces when you get something rare -Summoning which also include Pets -Many PKing area which also include Fun PKing with its own Points System -Perfect Wilderness with EP increasing which also increases the rarity of the drops you receive -Special Recovery Potions which can be purchased with Activity Points [b]NO they cannot be used in Wilderness[/b] -Perfect Korasi's Special -Perfect Hybriding and Switching -Limited PJing because no one likes that... -Perfect Spirit Shields with proper effects -Clue Scroll Caskets -x10 Hit Splashing as well as different Game Frames for your liking -Total Xp -Unique Home[/size]
[center][b][size=18pt]Now for some pictures...[/size][/b][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2vwigxf.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ilhkz5.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/117d502.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/34fbg9k.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2rpwqs1.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/21evwba.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/35l8bpv.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34o3bfb.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/24n1abl.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][size=17pt]Please note, this is not where Nex's Residence, I just spawned him for the picture.[/size][/b][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/50sh04.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2n24umc.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2vvs2oh.png[/img][/center]
[center][shadow=cyan,left][size=18pt]So by now I know you just can't wait for the links so here they are[/size][/shadow][/center]
[center]Vote for us here at http://www.google.com/toplist/details-16160-Wreckless.html[/center] [center]Download the client from one of the following links[/center]
[ul][li]http://uppit.com/fjqlk2xejuap/Wreckless_V4.jar[/li] [li]http://www.2shared.com/file/pOg8bX8p/Wreckless_V4.html[/li] [li]https://rapidshare.com/files/3269131801/Wreckless%20V4.jar[/li] [li]http://up.ht/PUKuP2[/li][/ul]
[center]*Note the times downloaded in Uppit has decreased since I recently just Jarred the Client and had to reupload[/center]
[center]Visit our Website at http://www.wreckless.smfnew.com/index.php[/center]
[center]Visit our updates thread here http://www.wreckless.smfnew.com/index.php?board=4.0[/center]
[center][shadow=cyan,left][size=22pt]Thank You! I hope you enjoy your stay here at Wreckless![/size][/shadow][/center]

item.title: *Wreckless* | Nex with Minions | Chaotics | ECO | Updates Daily! |
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

Vhenom:

I wouldn’t call it a regular one. It’s a dedicated one. Visit our Updates thread to see that it is a PI, but it’s one that we’ve worked hard on and have pretty much rewritten.

lmao, you didnt rewrite anything, you probably looked at some tutorials. i dont need to see your updates to see that. The pictures tell it all. You changed some cfg files and moved some skills.

Read full topic
item.source: *Wreckless* | Nex with Minions | Chaotics | ECO | Updates Daily! |

item.title: *Wreckless* | Nex with Minions | Chaotics | ECO | Updates Daily! |
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[center][shadow=cyan,left][size=18pt]We are Wreckless! And what is Wreckless you may ask? Well it’s a crazy friendly community one where you can do some Social Slayer with people and actually have some fun while doing it! We have a ton of stuff to offer you, and let me just tell you…it’s just the beginning…[/size][/shadow][/center]

[center][size=12pt]So what DO we have to offer you?[/size][/center]

[size=12pt]Well…

-We are dedicated to making this one of the best servers out there, that is why we bought a [shadow=red,left][shadow=red,left]VPS[/shadow][/shadow] which stays on 24/7
-One of the things people like most from us…our will to help you guys get the most enjoyment possible and we do this by not asking you to Donate every 5 seconds, because we are not here for the money, we’re here for the Experience and Fun.
-Daily Updates…and I mean DAILY visit here to see all our Updates
-We tons of bosses including: Tormented Demons, Astea Frostweb, Nex as well as his minions, and much more
-We like to focus on making it so when you want to skill you can do it in multiple places not just one tree in a skilling area that is why we have guilds, and tons of places to train at, because everyone wants that Completionist Cape
-Fully working Chaotic Weapons
-Great Economy and by this I mean every single item has its price as perfect as we can get it. That means no 6B whips and no 16B Torva Helms
-PK, Activity, Minigame, and many more Shops available at your liking and expenses
-Perfect XP Rates
-New Torva Armour as well as Pernix and Virtus
-Steadfast, Glaiven, and Ragefire boots + more 600-700 items
-Elite Slayer Tasks
-Completely Rewritten Combat System
-Normal and Ancient Prayers
-Turmoil also boosting Mage and Range
-Rocktails with proper life boosting effect
-Perfect Overloads
-Minigames written perfectly such as Pest Control, Dominion Tower, Barrows, Gravedigger and more
-Double Experience Weekends
-Highscores
-Fully Functional Clan Chat with lootshare which announces when you get something rare
-Summoning which also include Pets
-Many PKing area which also include Fun PKing with its own Points System
-Perfect Wilderness with EP increasing which also increases the rarity of the drops you receive
-Special Recovery Potions which can be purchased with Activity Points NO they cannot be used in Wilderness
-Perfect Korasi’s Special
-Perfect Hybriding and Switching
-Limited PJing because no one likes that…
-Perfect Spirit Shields with proper effects
-Clue Scroll Caskets
-x10 Hit Splashing as well as different Game Frames for your liking
-Total Xp
-Unique Home[/size]

[center][size=18pt]Now for some pictures…[/size][/center]

[center]

[/center]

[/center]

2n24umc.png764×508
[/center]

[center][/center]

[center][shadow=cyan,left][size=18pt]So by now I know you just can’t wait for the links so here they are[/size][/shadow][/center]

[center]Vote for us here at http://www.google.com/toplist/details-16160-Wreckless.html[/center]
[center]Download the client from one of the following links[/center]

[ul][li]http://uppit.com/fjqlk2xejuap/Wreckless_V4.jar[/li]
[li]http://www.2shared.com/file/pOg8bX8p/Wreckless_V4.html[/li]
[li]https://rapidshare.com/files/3269131801/Wreckless%20V4.jar[/li]
[li]http://up.ht/PUKuP2[/li][/ul]

[center]*Note the times downloaded in Uppit has decreased since I recently just Jarred the Client and had to reupload[/center]

[center]Visit our Website at http://www.wreckless.smfnew.com/index.php[/center]

[center]Visit our updates thread here http://www.wreckless.smfnew.com/index.php?board=4.0[/center]

[center][shadow=cyan,left][size=22pt]Thank You! I hope you enjoy your stay here at Wreckless![/size][/shadow][/center]
